title: Special Rating Provisions and General Rules
description: Key rating rules, combined ratings, and special considerations

combined_ratings.description: Disabilities are combined using the Combined Ratings Table, not simple addition
combined_ratings.principle: Combine most severe rating first, then combine that result with next rating, etc.
combined_ratings.rounding: Combined values ending in 0.5 or higher are rounded up to nearest 10%
combined_ratings.formula: Combined = A + B(1-A), where A and B are decimal values of ratings

bilateral_factor.description: Extra 10% added when both paired extremities are disabled
applies_to: Both upper extremities or both lower extremities
bilateral_factor.calculation: Combine bilateral disabilities, multiply by 0.1, add to combined value
bilateral_factor.example: Left knee 20% + Right knee 10% = 28% combined. 28 x 0.1 = 2.8. 28 + 2.8 = 30.8, which becomes 31%

pyramiding_prohibition.rule: The evaluation of the same manifestation under different diagnoses is to be avoided
pyramiding_prohibition.meaning: Cannot receive multiple ratings for the same symptoms
exceptions: Knee: Instability (5257) can be rated separately from arthritis/limitation of motion
Knee: Limited flexion (5260) and extension (5261) can be rated separately
Spine: Radiculopathy rated separately from spinal condition
Mental health: Only ONE rating for all mental disorders combined

painful_motion.rule: Painful motion of a major joint warrants at least the minimum compensable rating
painful_motion.application: With X-ray evidence of arthritis and painful motion, minimum 10% applies

deluca_factors.requirements: Examiner must consider functional loss due to:
deluca_factors.importance: May support higher rating than pure ROM measurements

staged_ratings.description: Different ratings can be assigned for different periods
staged_ratings.application: If condition severity varied during appeal period, different ratings apply to different periods

benefit_of_doubt.rule: When evidence is in approximate balance, give benefit of doubt to veteran
benefit_of_doubt.application: If evidence is 50-50, decide in favor of the veteran

tdiu.name: Total Disability Individual Unemployability
tdiu.description: 100% rating based on inability to work due to service-connected disabilities

schedular_criteria.combined_disabilities: Combined rating of 70% or more, with at least one disability rated 40% or more

tdiu.extraschedular: Can be granted even without meeting schedular criteria on case-by-case basis
tdiu.requirement: Must be unable to secure or follow substantially gainful employment due to service-connected disabilities

special_monthly_compensation.description: Additional compensation for specific severe disabilities

types.for: Loss of use of one hand, one foot, both buttocks, one or more creative organs, blindness in one eye, complete organic aphonia
Need for regular aid and attendance or housebound
Anatomical loss or loss of use of both arms, both legs, or combination
Need for higher level of aid and attendance (R1 or R2)
Housebound status - one disability at 100% plus additional disabilities at 60%+

5_year_rule.description: Ratings in effect for 5+ years cannot be reduced unless sustained improvement is shown

10_year_rule.description: Service connection in effect for 10+ years cannot be severed except for fraud

20_year_rule.description: Rating in effect for 20+ years cannot be reduced below the lowest rating it has been during that period

effective_dates.general_rule: Effective date is date of claim or date entitlement arose, whichever is later

exceptions.rule: Date of increase if claim filed within 1 year, otherwise date of claim
May be effective date of law change for existing claimants
May allow earlier effective date if records were not previously considered

agent_orange.qualifying_service: Vietnam, Thailand (certain bases), Korean DMZ, other qualifying locations

pact_act.qualifying_service: Burn pit and toxic exposure locations
other_conditions: Multiple conditions based on location and timeframe

gulf_war.qualifying_service: Southwest Asia theater from August 1990 onward
